CustomField.description: Rounding With Carry Over is a special configuration that uses a carryover from one cell to the next to ensure that aggregations and totals match with the rounded number. Rounding Enabled performs a simple rounding to the nearest number.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Rounding With Carry Over is a special configuration that uses a carryover from one cell to the next to ensure that aggregations and totals match with the rounded number. Rounding Enabled performs a simple rounding to the nearest number.
CustomField.label: Rounding Type
